_mfm.emojiDescription: By surrounding a custom emoji name with colons, custom emoji can be displayed.
_mfm.searchDescription: Displays a search box with pre-entered text.
_mfm.twitchDescription: Gives content a strongly twitching animation.
_mfm.x4Description: Displays content even bigger than bigger than big.
_mfm.blurDescription: Blurs content. It will be displayed clearly when hovered over.
_mfm.fontDescription: Sets the font to display content in.
_mfm.rainbowDescription: Makes the content appear in rainbow colors.
_mfm.sparkleDescription: Gives content a sparkling particle effect.
_mfm.rotateDescription: Turns content by a specified angle.
_mfm.positionDescription: Move content by a specified amount.
_mfm.followMouseDescription: Content will follow the mouse. On mobile it will follow wherever the user taps.
_mfm.scaleDescription: Scale content by a specified amount.
_mfm.foregroundDescription: Change the foreground color of text.
_mfm.backgroundDescription: Change the background color of text.
_mfm.plainDescription: Deactivates the effects of all MFM contained within this MFM effect.
_mfm.borderDescription: Draw a border around the content.

_alert.text: Animated MFMs could include flashing lights and fast moving text/emojis.

stpvAntennaPatch:
Sharkey Stelpolva Edition adds additional keyword syntax to the antenna settings.
That means, the special keyword `domain:example.com` will match all posts from `example.com`. This keyword can also be used in OR syntax.
Specifically, you must use `domain:here` to match posts in this instance.
stpvPgroongaSearchInstru: Use the `A OR B` syntax to search for notes containing either A or B. `A B` (with a space in between) means posts containing both keywords A and B.

makePrivate.description: Making a post private will make it visible only to you and send a deletion request to remote servers.
makePrivate.confirm: Are you sure you want to make this post private?
makePrivate.warn: Making posts private in batches is a **permanent, irreversible** process and places a certain amount of load on the server. Please proceed with caution. You can only make posts private in batches once an hour.
makePrivate.dangerTip: Since this is a very dangerous operation, please enter `{text}` to enable this feature
makePrivate.manyCount: There are {count} posts that will be made private
makePrivate.manyWarn: Do you really want to make these {count} posts private in batches? This operation is irreversible and your posts will only be visible to you forever (really!)
